title: Georgia Mom Critically Wounded in Shooting by 4-Year-Old Son
content:
By: Associated Press
August 17, 2015
DOUGLAS, Ga. (AP) -- Authorities say a southwest Georgia woman is critically wounded after being shot in the head by her 4-year-old son.
The Georgia Bureau of Investigation says the shooting happened Sunday night as the woman and her son were sitting in a car parked in front of their home near Douglas.
The GBI says the boy found the gun, picked it up thinking it was a toy, and pulled the trigger.
The GBI did not immediately release the name of the woman who was shot.
Authorities say she was flown to a hospital in critical condition.
